name: Replication (HEJ_ Game Jam_ March)
description:
Puzzle game inspired by the UI of dating and messaging apps. Breed the random human and beat your high score in a set amount of time.

HOW TO PLAY(no tutorial yet):

•TARGET button(bottom of the screen) will show the human you have to bread... LOOK OUT for the timer counting back while memorizing the features of the target.

(you will lose if the counter reaches 0.)

•pick the chosen features(middle of the screen) that you want the bottom person to inherit from the top and swipe RIGHT.

•Swep left to look for someone else to breed with :D

•When you think you have the target person breed then press the TARGET button(bottom of the screen) to get your result.
